channel.title: Salancia 317 Is Back!
channel.description:
[B][I][CENTER][IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/bevrq0.jpg[/img]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8sf5tPiLRKg

[SIZE=5]New client with new configurations and switched VPS just a few hours ago! Has only been running for a day.
As its a new server, a double donations week is on! $1 = 2 Bonds!! $50 = 120 Bonds!! $100 = 140 Bonds!!
Website developers are needed. [/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/xm7c5h.png[/img]
Switched to the new vps and updated the client. Download the new client here:
[url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/rqqx4uu18smb1f1/Salancia.jar?dl=0]https://www.dropbox.com/s/rqqx4uu18smb1f1/Salancia.jar?dl=0[/url]
[IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/1zoxoy1.png[/img]
New Content- Rise of Six mini game New Bosses with unique drops 1 new pvm zone Newly added weapons Boss pets Unique Weapons Addictive Dicing Pk events Boss Farming!
[IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/2q8u1ki.png[/img]
- Jad - FunPk - Barrows - Duel Arena - Rise of Six (New one)

item.title: Salancia 317 Is Back!

item.description:

[B][I][CENTER]

xmjzfa.png744×64

[SIZE=5]New client with new configurations and switched VPS just a few hours ago! Has only been running for a day.

As its a new server, a double donations week is on!
$1 = 2 Bonds!!
$50 = 120 Bonds!!
$100 = 140 Bonds!!

Website developers are needed. [/SIZE]

Switched to the new vps and updated the client. Download the new client here:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/rqqx4uu18smb1f1/Salancia.jar?dl=0
